full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## PUMP UNIT, CENTRIFUGAL
A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued by the Department of National Defence for the procurement of Centrifugal Pumps.

### Item 1: Centrifugal Pump - CFB Esquimalt, BC
- **Item Number**: 1
- **National Standard Number (NSN)**: 21-904-1965
- **Pump Type**: Centrifugal
- **Unit of Issue**: EA
- **Quantity**: 12
- **Delivery Location**: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
- **Acceptable Models**: FF704106-0 or FF704106/X6036D (INGERSOLL-RAND CANDA INC)
- **Bidders are required to quote in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency quotes will not be accepted.**

### Item 2: Centrifugal Pump - CFB Halifax, NS
- **Item Number**: 2
- **National Standard Number (NSN)**: 21-904-1965
- **Pump Type**: Centrifugal
- **Unit of Issue**: EA
- **Quantity**: 12
- **Delivery Location**: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
- **Acceptable Models**: FF704106-0 or FF704106/X6036D (INGERSOLL-RAND CANDA INC)
- **Bidders are required to quote in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency quotes will not be accepted.**

### Submission Requirements
- Bidders must submit proposals in one of the official languages of Canada (English or French).
- Proposals must include the brand name and model (or NCAGE) of the proposed product.
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate prices and terms with suppliers.

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact Jean-Pierre Normandin, at (819) 939-3674 or email [Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca).

### Tender Package
Tender documents are available on the Buy and Sell website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). They are also available in electronic format at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27826/rfp-w8482-242252-a-en_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files
